response.original_title: Do You See What I'm Saying - Secrets of Body Language Made Simple
response.overview: Did you know that during conversation, 60 to 90 percent of all communication is done through body language? Former counterintelligence operative Van Ritch understands this from professional experience, and in this revealing video production from Paladin Press, he will show you how to better understand what people are saying to you with their behavior to get to this unspoken truth.
response.title: Do You See What I'm Saying - Secrets of Body Language Made Simple
